heading: Kedarnath
detail: Kedarnath is a famous Hindu pilgrimage site located in the Indian state of Uttarakhand. It is part of the Char Dham Yatra and is dedicated to Lord Shiva.

heading: Badrinath
detail: Badrinath is another significant pilgrimage site in Uttarakhand, dedicated to Lord Vishnu. It is one of the Char Dham and attracts numerous devotees each year.

heading: Gangotri
detail: Gangotri is a sacred town in Uttarakhand, known as the origin of the Ganges River. It is an important pilgrimage site for Hindus and is part of the Char Dham Yatra.

heading: Yamunotri
detail: Yamunotri is the source of the Yamuna River and a significant pilgrimage site in Uttarakhand. It is the starting point of the Char Dham Yatra.
